descriptions.title: Software Developer at WarnerMedia
descriptions.description: Developed on platform overrides of React-Native, that uses the You.i C++ engine which supports app development for a multitude of TV, mobile, console and desktop platforms. Contributed to external packages built on top of the You.i React-Native override, such as adding new native platform functionality.

descriptions.title: Teaching Assistant at Carleton University
descriptions.description: Reinforced object oriented programming concepts for students through interactive sessions. Clarified how memory works in C++, as well as demonstrated debugging strategies to students. Graded assignments in a timely fashion and provided feedback.
